title: Add monitoring and error alerting
description: Set up basic monitoring: uptime checks, error rate tracking, usage analytics. Consider UptimeRobot (free) for uptime and simple logging for business metrics.

title: Add HTTPS with nginx + certbot
description: Set up nginx as reverse proxy to port 8000. Install certbot for free Let's Encrypt SSL certificate. Required for RapidAPI integration.

title: Replace file-based auth with Redis/PostgreSQL
description: Current auth uses usage_data.json file. For production scale, replace with Redis for rate limiting and PostgreSQL for API key management. Add webhook handler for RapidAPI customer signups.

title: Add batch parsing endpoint
description: Add POST /parse/batch endpoint for parsing multiple resumes in one request. Premium feature for Ultra/Mega tiers. Accepts zip file or array of files.

title: Get OpenAI or Anthropic API key
description: Sign up for OpenAI or Anthropic API access. Set key in .env file. Recommend starting with OpenAI gpt-4o-mini for lowest cost per request (~/usr/bin/bash.15/1M input tokens)

title: Add landing page for direct sales
description: Build simple landing page with API docs, pricing, and Stripe checkout. Sell directly alongside RapidAPI to keep 97% instead of 75%. Use simple HTML or Next.js.

title: Publish API on RapidAPI marketplace
description: Create provider account on RapidAPI, configure endpoints (/parse, /parse/text, /usage), set pricing tiers (Free/Pro/Ultra/Mega), add documentation and examples
